item.title: Generating documentation with Sphinx
item.description: Quick Notes Pip install sphinx rather than through apt-get bceause otherwise TZ settings do not work well sphinx-quickstart Most defaults are OK but: We want to set default document to markdown rather than RST We want to enable MathJax Edit conf.py: If you want to change the default theme, we can use RTD by changing the line to: html_theme = 'sphinx_rtd_theme' Uncomment the lines of code here: ```python If extensions (or modules to document with autodoc) are in another directory, add these directories to sys.
